definition: any collection in its entirety, to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
details:
noun
- any collection in its entirety
= synonyms: lot
- a grouping of a number of similar things
= example: a grouping of a number of similar things
= synonyms: clump
- an informal body of friends
= synonyms: gang
verb
- to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
= example: to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
= synonyms: bundle
- to form into a bunch
= example: to form into a bunch
= synonyms: bunch up, bunch together
